item.title: 【Singles (lossless)】FLAC - Ace Of Base - Flowers era (all singles)
item.description:
These are taken from 'Beautiful Life - The Singles'. This part contains all the Life Is A Flower/Flowers Era. I have also included mixes that were released previously but were not included in this set.


Life Is A Flower
  1. Life Is A Flower
  2. Life Is A Flower [Raggae Version]
  3. Life Is A Flower [Alternative Mix]
  4. Life Is A Flower [Extended Version]
  5. Life Is A Flower [Sweetbox Mix]
  6. Life Is A Flower [Soul Poets Night Club Mix]
  7. Life Is A Flower [Soul Poets Instrumental]
  8. Life Is A Flower [Absolom Edit]
  9. Life Is A Flower [Absolom Mix]
  10. Life Is A Flower [Milk UHT Edit]
  11. Life Is A Flower [Milk UHT Club Mix]
  12. Life Is A Flower [Milk Long Edit]
  13. Life Is A Flower [Milk Long Instrumental]
  14. No Good Lover
  15. No Good Lover [Alternative Mix]
  16. No Good Lover [Alternative Instrumental]
